name: DEJAVU-The Story Of Paco
description:
Deja Vu / The Story of Paco is a simplistic puzzle game where you experience being stuck in a inescapable room that never ends. Follow the riddles and the clues to uncover Paco untold story.

If you like the content please leave some feedback down below and follow me on Instagram @TheYesManJose to get the latest updates on projects that are being develop.

Input Information

  • Arrows Key = Movement & Jump
  • Space = Interaction

Playing on The Web Player

  • Click on the full screen button to enjoy the experience.

Credits behind the game:

Designer & Programmer : Jose Deschamps

Music by : Julie Maxwell
